IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. documentation.text:
@title SmartRouterOrder
 @dev This contract serves as a smart router for routing swap orders through multiple pools.

@dev Initializes the contract by setting the pool factory address.
 @param _poolFactory The address of the BaluniV1PoolFactory contract.

@dev Reinitializes the contract with a new pool factory address.
 @param _poolFactory The address of the new BaluniV1PoolFactory contract.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Amount must be greater than zero"

arguments.value: Amount must be greater than zero

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Amount must be greater than zero"

typeDescriptions.typeString: function () view external returns (bool[] memory,uint256[] memory)
function (uint256) view external returns (struct IBaluniV1Pool.AssetInfo memory)
